summary: REQ-1 is implemented: the Contact page now displays the exact email address and uses the correct mailto link, with no phone number added. Two additional files were modified (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) beyond the requested Contact page change.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/tracking files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) beyond the requested Contact page email change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to update the email on the existing Contact page; it did not request changes to project metadata or summary files.
